price: 6 en criant au mensonge. Ils subiront donc un jour les conséquences de leurs moqueries.
arabic: فَقَدۡ كَذَّبُواْ فَسَيَأۡتِيهِمۡ أَنۢبَٰٓؤُاْ مَا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: faqad kadhabū fasayatīhim anbāu mā kānū bihi yastahziūna
